Class ChainedRegime

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Regime>, Regime
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public class ChainedRegime extends Object implements Regime, Iterable<Regime>
Composes and executes a chain of Regime decorators.

The chain stores regimes in order and, when trained, delegates to the top (last) regime. If the chain is empty, this class will invoke the provided Optimizer directly on the full DataSet as a single batch (a safe no-op fallback if the caller omitted regimes).

Semantics

  • Top regime: the last element in chainedRegimes receives the train(E, net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet, net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction, net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer<? super E>) call and typically wraps the rest.
  • Lookup: getRegime(Class) and findRegime(java.util.function.Predicate) return the first matching regime for introspection or reconfiguration.
  • Iteration: Implements Iterable to expose the chain order (top to bottom).

  • Field Details

    • chainedRegimes

      protected final List<Regime> chainedRegimes
      The ordered chain of regimes; the last element is the top/outermost decorator.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChainedRegime

      protected ChainedRegime(List<Regime> chainedRegimes)
      Creates a new chain.
      Parameters:
      chainedRegimes - ordered regimes; the last is considered the "top". May be empty; in that case train(E, net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet, net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction, net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer<? super E>) falls back to direct optimizer invocation if provided.

  • Method Details

    • train

      public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
      Trains by delegating to the topmost regime in the chain. If the chain is empty, invokes the Optimizer directly (if non-null) on the full dataset.
      Specified by:
      train in interface Regime
      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of estimation function
      Parameters:
      estimationFunction - the model to train
      trainingSet - the dataset to train on
      objective - the objective (loss) function
      optimizer - the optimizer to apply updates (used directly if chain is empty)

    • iterator

      public Iterator<Regime> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the regimes in from top to bottom.
